document.masterDocTitle: A review of Chelonian type specimens (order Testudines)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of Chelonian type specimens (order Testudines)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype
: Not designated (see Loveridge 1941:480 ), although illustrated in the original description, Pl. I, Figs. 1–2; ZFMK 17076 designated as neotype by
Fritz et al. (2014b:504
; photographed in
Fritz et al. 2014b:516
; sampled genetically by
Petzold et al. 2014
and
Fritz et al. 2014b
).

treatmentCitation.author: Fritz, U. & Petzold, A. & Kehlmaier, C. & Kindler, C. & Campbell, P. & Hofmeyr, M. D. & Branch, W. R.

taxonomicName.authority: Petzold, Vargas-Ramirez, Kehlmaier, Vamberger, Branch, Du Preez, Hofmeyr, Meyers, Schleicher, Siroky, & Fritz 2014 b: 539

taxonomicName.emphasis: Pelomedusa schweinfurthi Petzold, Vargas-Ramírez, Kehlmaier, Vamberger, Branch, Du Preez, Hofmeyr, Meyers, Schleicher, Široký, & Fritz 2014b:539

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype
:
SMF 56161
(photographed in
Petzold et al. 2014:538
, and Vetter 2018:144 );
paratypes
(3):
SMF 56160
and 56162; and
ZMB 15697
. All types sampled genetically by
Petzold et al. (2014)
.

taxonomicName.authority: Petzold, Vargas-Ramirez, Kehlmaier, Vamberger, Branch, Du Preez, Hofmeyr, Meyers, Schleicher, Siroky, & Fritz 2014: 540

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype :
MNHN7970(
Fritz et al. 2014b:504
); illustrated in Lacepède (1788 :opp. p. 173); photographed in Bour 2009a:27 and
Fritz et al. 2014b:507
); sampled genetically by
Fritz et al. (2014b)
.

bibRefCitation.author: Lacepede, B. G. E. de
bibRefCitation.refString: Lacepede, B. G. E. de. (1788) Histoire Naturelle des Quadrupedes Ovipares et des Serpens. Tome Premier. Hotel de Thou, Paris, 651 pp. [octavo edition, 8 o]. https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / bhl. title. 5036

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype :
MNHN 7970 (
Fritz et al. 2014b:504
); illustrated in the original description (opp. p. 173); photographed in Bour 2009a:27 and
Fritz et al. 2014b:507
); sampled genetically by
Fritz et al. (2014b)
.

bibRefCitation.author: Hewitt, J.
bibRefCitation.refString: Hewitt, J. (1935) Some new forms of batrachians and reptiles from South Africa. Records of the Albany Museum, 4, 283 - 357.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Syntypes (2; both sampled genetically by
Fritz et al.
2014b): PEM R14953 and R 14954 ; PEM R14953 designated lectotype by
Fritz et al. (2014b:504
; photographed in
Fritz et al. 2014b:517
; sampled genetically by
Fritz et al. 2014b
and
Petzold et al. 2014
).

bibRefCitation.author: Mertens, R.
bibRefCitation.refString: Mertens, R. (1937) Bemerkungen uber die Rassen von Pelomedusa subrufa (La Cepede). Zoologischer Anzeiger, 117, 139 - 142.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype
: SMF 7958 ( Mertens 1967:52 ); photographed in
Fritz et al. (2014b:518)
;
paratypes
(4 according to the original description), presumably in the SMF .

);
